name: members-visualization
description: 组织成员研究方向可视化展示

scripts.docs:dev: npm run copy-data && vitepress dev docs
scripts.docs:build: npm run copy-data && cross-env NODE_ENV=production vitepress build docs
scripts.copy-data: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const srcDir=path.join(__dirname,'data'); const destDir=path.join(__dirname,'docs','public','data'); if(!fs.existsSync(destDir)) fs.mkdirSync(destDir,{recursive:true}); if(fs.existsSync(path.join(srcDir,'members.csv'))) fs.copyFileSync(path.join(srcDir,'members.csv'),path.join(destDir,'members.csv'));"

author: Datawhale
